purposeField.label: Choose template
purposeField.noDataLabel: No templates available for this e-service

consumerField.label: Consumer
consumerField.infoLabel: Among the members, you can only select your organization or the members for whom you have an active delegation

eserviceField.label: Choose e-service
eserviceField.infoLabel: You can only select the e-services for which the selected user has an active request for use

alert.label: The facilitated compilation feature is available for the selected e-service!

eserviceRiskAnalysisSection.title: Choose purpose
eserviceRiskAnalysisSection.description: The selected e-service requires the producer to receive data from consumers. You can select from the purposes proposed by the producer the one for which you intend to send data to its e-service.

purposeTemplateField.title: Facilitated purpose compilation
purposeTemplateField.description: The facilitated compilation feature provides annotations, supporting documents, and some pre-filled answers to help you formulate the risk analysis. The template is made available for reuse by other participating organizations and can be used without restrictions.

usePurposeTemplateSwitch.label: Use the facilitated compilation feature
usePurposeTemplateSwitch.disabledTooltip:
It is not possible to use the feature for the selected 
 e-service because the producer has not indicated how personal data will be processed

selectPurposeTemplate.title: Choose the facilitated purpose compilation template
selectPurposeTemplate.showOnlyLinkedPurposeTemplates: Show only templates suggested for the selected e-service

acknowledgeInfoResponsibility.label: I acknowledge that, even in the presence of pre-filled suggestions, it is my responsibility to verify and validate all information before publication.
acknowledgeInfoResponsibility.requiredError: You must accept the conditions to proceed

nameField.label: Purpose name (required)
nameField.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart. Min 5 characters, max 60 characters

isFreeOfChargeField.label: Indicate whether access to the data made available with the use of this e-service is free of charge (required)

freeOfChargeReasonField.label: Free of charge reason (required)
freeOfChargeReasonField.infoLabel: It is requested to specify whether the provision of data is free of charge by virtue of an exemption/exclusion provided for by law or other. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

dailyCallsField.label: How many API calls do you expect to make per day?

stepRiskAnalysis.title: Risk analysis
stepRiskAnalysis.description: The questions below will change based on the answers provided. If you edit an answer above, it may change the following questions
stepRiskAnalysis.personalInfoAlert: Warning: do not put personal data inside text fields

versionMismatchDialog.title: Risk analysis update
versionMismatchDialog.description: There is a new version of risk analysis available. The one compiled previously is obsolete and can no longer be used. If you click "Update", all the fields that have not changed and were filled in will already be filled in in the new version

personalDataFlag.label: Personal data processing

content.true: The producer declares to process personal data
content.false: The producer declares not to process personal data
content.undefined: The producer has not declared the processing of personal data

incompatibleAnswerError.purposeEdit: The answer in this field differs from what was defined by the e-service producer

personalDataFlag.alertForIncompatibleAnswer: Please ensure that the answer to the question "Indicate whether you access personal data (required)" matches the one the producer provided in the general information. If the data does not match, publication will be blocked.

alertForIncompatibleAnswerPurpose.personalData: You will not be able to publish this purpose because you declared that personal data is processed, but the producer declared otherwise. For clarification, contact the producer.
alertForIncompatibleAnswerPurpose.noPersonalData: You will not be able to publish this purpose because you declared that personal data is not processed, but the producer declared otherwise. For clarification, contact the producer.

generalInformationSection.title: General information
generalInformationSection.subtitle: The following information was pre-filled by the creator of the facilitated purpose template and can't be modified.

dailyCallsField.label: How many API calls/day do you estimate to make?

summary.title: Summary

alerts.associationRemoved: The client association was removed within the process. It will be possible to associate one or more clients only after the activation of the purpose.
alerts.newRiskAnalysisAvailable: This draft is no longer publishable. Since its creation, a new version of the risk analysis has been released. Delete it and create a new one.
alerts.descriptorOrAgreementArchived: This draft is no longer publishable. The agreement of this e-service is no longer active. Delete it and create a new one.

rulesetExpired.label: This risk analysis uses an obsolete version that you cannot publish.

alerts.infoRulesetExpiration: This risk analysis uses a version that will become obsolete in {{days}} days. Publish it by {{date}} to avoid having to recompile it.

dailyCallsPerConsumer.label: Per consumer threshold set by the producer

dailyCallsTotal.label: Total threshold set by the producer

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.providerRiskAnalysisAlert: The e-service selected for this purpose requires data to be sent from the consumer to the producer. The risk analysis was therefore compiled by the producer.

summary.publishBtnDisabled: Your declaration on personal data processing in the risk analysis prevents publication

list.cantCreatePurposeTooltip: You cannot create purposes because you have no associable e-service
list.newVersionAvailableTooltip: The consumer has requested an adjustment that requires your approval. Access the purpose for more details
list.waitingForApprovalVersionTooltip: You have requested an adjustment that requires approval from the producer. Access the purpose for more details

providerView.suspendedAlert: This purpose is suspended. Until it is reactivated, the consumer will not be able to access the data provided through the API.
providerView.waitingForApprovalAlert: The consumer has requested a load estimate update which requires your approval. Check the “Load Estimate” section.
providerView.archivedPurposeAlert: The consumer will not be able to obtain a voucher from PDND Interoperabilità for this purpose because it is archived.
providerView.rejectedPurposeAlert: This purpose has been rejected. <1>Read here the reject reason</1>.
providerView.rejectedUpdatePlanInfoAlert: A change of plan for this purpose was rejected. Check the “Load Estimate” section.

technicalInformations.title: Purpose technical information
technicalInformations.description: In this section you can check the technical information of the purpose.

loadEstimate.title: Load estimate
loadEstimate.description: The number of API calls/day that the consumer estimates to make to the API of your e-service
loadEstimate.rejectedUpdatePlanAlert: The plan change was rejected. <1>Read the reject reasons here</1>.

waitingForApprovalPlan.changePlan: The plan change requested by the Consumer
waitingForApprovalPlan.newPurpose: The plan requested by the Consumer

title.rejectedPlan: The plan requested by the Consumer

consumerView.suspendedAlert: This purpose is suspended. Until it is reactivated you will not be able to access the data made available through the API.
consumerView.waitingForApprovalAlert: This scope is awaiting approval. Until its activation by the producer you will not be able to access the data made available through the API and you will not be able to associate clients.
consumerView.archivedPurposeAlert: This purpose is archived. You cannot access the data made available through the API. You can always <1>create a new one.</1>
consumerView.archivedPurposeClientsAlert: This purpose has been archived. All clients were removed and new clients can no longer be associated
consumerView.rejectedPurposeAlert: This purpose has been rejected. <2>Read here the reject reason</2>.
consumerView.rejectedUpdatePlanInfoAlert: A change of plan for this purpose was rejected. Check the “Load Estimate” section in <1>Purpose Details</1>.
consumerView.noClientsAlert: This purpose is active but has no associated clients. <1>Pair your first client</1> to use the e-service
consumerView.noClientsAlertForDelegateWithoutClientPe: This intent is active but has no associated clients. Wait for {{delegatorName}} to connect its clients for the request to complete.
consumerView.cloneDisabledDueToExpiredRuleset: It is not possible to clone the purpose because the risk analysis model has been updated and is no longer compatible

addClientToPurposeDisableTooltip.label: Only an administrator can manage members of a client

tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs for purposes details and associated clients

loadEstimate.title: Load estimate
loadEstimate.description: The number of API calls/day that the Consumer estimates to make to the API of your e-service
loadEstimate.rejectedUpdatePlanAlert: The plan change was rejected. <1>Read the reject reasons here</1>.

updatePlanCard.title: The plan change you requested
updatePlanCard.subtitle: (API calls/day)
updatePlanCard.expectApprovalDateInfo: You estimated to activate this update on the day {{date}}

drawer.title: Request update
drawer.subtitle: Your current estimate is {{dailyCalls}} API calls/day. If the new value exceeds at least one of the thresholds imposed by the producer, it must be approved before becoming active. Do you have any doubts? <1>Read the guide.

validation.sameValue: The number of API calls/day requested must be different than the current one

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: You can update the estimate only if the risk analysis linked to this purpose is still valid.

checkbox.label: The risk analysis is unchanged
checkbox.requiredValidation: To request the update, confirm that the risk analysis has remained unchanged

alertExceedingThreshold.label: If the number of calls exceeds the limit set by the producer, its approval will be required to use that load
